sub_title: I'm an Experimentation Evangelist, and on Linkedin I share my thoughts and learnings on Conversion Optimization, Digital Experimentation, Experimentation Culture, and A/B-testing.
summary:
I help organizations to become more successful by adopting a solid experimentation and validation approach.

I've been working in this industry for over 20 years and still love it. Experimentation brings answers and joy; it's a key driver for growth.

In this field of work, I've started agencies, websites and tools, wrote lots of articles, and created training courses and events.

My main love never changed to something other than the actual work itself, and I've now happily consulted over 50 organizations in 10 different countries.

Eat, sleep, experiment, repeat.

>> Follow me here on Linkedin for thoughts and learnings on conversion optimization and digital experimentation. Reach out through DM or https://tonw.com for training, speaking, and consultancy inquiries.
